roleData.title: Senior UI/UX Designer
roleData.description: Led user experience design for digital products, conducted user research, created wireframes and prototypes, and collaborated with cross-functional teams to deliver intuitive and accessible design solutions.

roleData.title: UI/UX Designer
roleData.description: Designed user interfaces for web and mobile applications, conducted usability testing, created design systems, and improved user engagement through data-driven design decisions.
